texts.textentryhtml: Robinson, Fisher & Harding, Anonymous sale, London, 24 March 1910, lot 154; Shepherd Brothers, London 1910; A.M. Grenfell sale, June 26, 1914, lot 53; Colonel Swinfen Broun; his sale Christie's, London, December 10, 1948, no. 113 [bought in]; sale April 1, 1949, lot 127; Arthur Appleby, London; ca. 1956 sold to Charles D. Childs; Child's Gallery, Inc., Boston; purchased by Stuart Feld, 1966; 1982 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.
